custom_css: h2,ul,p {padding-inline-start: var(--gutter-container); padding-inline-end: var(--gutter-container); width: 100%; max-width: 900px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;}
custom_liquid_VEPfba.name: t:sections.refactor_words.custom_code.name

settings.custom_liquid:
Blacksmith | Brand

{%- assign all_vendors = shop.vendors | sort -%} {%- if all_vendors.size > 0 -%}
    {%- for vendor in all_vendors -%} {%- unless vendor == blank -%} {%- assign vendor_handle = vendor | handleize -%} {%- assign vendor_collection = collections[vendor_handle] -%} {%- assign non_archived_count = 0 -%} {%- assign in_stock_count = 0 -%} {%- if vendor_collection and vendor_collection.products.size > 0 -%} {%- for product in vendor_collection.products -%} {%- unless product.status == 'archived' -%} {%- assign non_archived_count = non_archived_count | plus: 1 -%} {%- endunless -%} {%- for variant in product.variants -%} {%- if variant.inventory_quantity and variant.inventory_quantity > 0 -%} {%- assign in_stock_count = in_stock_count | plus: 1 -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
  • {{ vendor }} {% if vendor_collection %} [edit in admin] {% endif %}   ({{ non_archived_count }} Listed / {{ in_stock_count }} In stock)
    • {%- endunless -%} {%- endfor -%}
{%- endif -%}
